02/22/2022

Get A Head Today! 

Right now you can have the power change your messaging or voice calling default from one app to another using your Talking Head®! Enable any combination for voice or messaging apps at any time. A difference is that you are the one in control what apps will connect when making calls and sending messages from virtually any phone number. Make calls and send messages with a touch right from any phone number or e-mail using all the apps that you like! 

Also, now available on Google® Play Store®. Easily change settings with Android® Talking Head® at: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=talk.android.talkinghead

● You’ve got all the power for changing phone calling/messaging provider preferences using Talking Head® program.

      Your Talking Head® is turning all your apps into interactive phone call numbers. Talking Head® is creating interacting phone numbers on all your favorite apps, websites, search pages social and business networking sites.

               ● Your Talking Head® makes apps into interactive phone numbers that’s turning your apps into voice phone calling apps! 

               ● Do you have problems changing electronic messaging apps/e-mail and phone calling default settings? Your Talking Head® also has the easiest way for you to change your device's defaults for sending electronic messages/mail. 
            
            All versions (basic and premium) will change numbers into interactive numbers on any site:
☑First and foremost enables phone numbers to become interactive (interacting) numbers. Enabling any voice or message apps for making calls and sending messages from any web page site, PDF, or other applications. So, you will control settings and customizations, not the biggest enterprise technology companies.

            Your Talking Head® Free (basic) version from app stores includes:
☑ Easily change from three (3) popular voice calling apps and your device’s Standard Settings.
☑ Easily change e-mail settings from one type to another. Hassel free from complicated device settings.
☑ Easily make changes with this method for making calls and send messages from favorite web page sites using apps people like.

Only our U.S. Patented Technology is interacting with all the consumer commercial apps that people like! Companies can add their customized solutions apps, logos, links to social and business networking sites.*

             Your Talking Head® Premium version will include:
Available on Google's® Chrome Store®, and Play Store® for your official Android Talking Head®. Get the companion app! Or visit our website at: 
                                  www.Talkinghead.XYZ
☑ All the features of your basic starter program version plus added features of Premium!
☑ Enables phone numbers to become interactive (interacting) numbers.
☑ Easily enable more apps you like, drag and drop, customize apps and more.
☑ Include many other apps people like, such as “Viber out”, and enabled to add more to come!
☑ Go Premium is robust action packed version. With many more cool features, options and alternative programs!
☑ Go Premium and as a bonus get access to more than 23 added apps!
☑ Get Premium to access your library for more apps; Visit: Your library to add apps to. Go to Visit https://www.talkinghead.xyz/talking.head_live/build/index.html  
(tap to link at lower left corner of your talking Head user interface to access your library page).
            
               You’ll maintain The Most Ultimate Power to make interactive phone numbers, customize and expand your app’s features by using all the apps that you already like! Or, by adding other apps you find in the future, and, A World of Others Yet To Come!
